attributes.action: Reveal what it intends to spend the increased revinue from Fuel Duty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the Increase in Fuel duty, the government is not able to assist in producing a better public transport system. This is due to a large majority of what was public transport is now in the hands of the private sector.
Thus if the provided transport is to be made better by the government then it would have to subsidise private companies with public money.
How can the government continue to say it will make public transport a better service when it does not control the countries transportation system?
